name: Lab Splats
description:
You've finally made it out of conditioning academy and it's time to show your beloved scientist that you're the best labsplatter around! Use scientific concoctions to temporarily put your competitors to sleep. Splat the most rats to win!

C O N T R O L S

MOVE - D-Pad+ BOMB   -   AX BOMB   -   BSQUEAK   -   X

Made for the Society of Play arcade cabinet, but you can play it locally! Just get 1-4 controllers and start splattin' your buddies rats.
